title: Scientific Method
description: Learn the fundamental steps of scientific inquiry and how to apply the scientific method.
summary: This course explores the systematic process used by scientists to investigate natural phenomena and develop reliable knowledge.

title: Research Methods in Psychology
description: Explore the various approaches used to conduct psychological research.
summary: This course covers the core research methodologies, experimental design, ethical considerations, and statistical analysis techniques used in psychological science.

title: Introduction to Cognitive Psychology
description: Discover how the mind processes information, forms memories, and solves problems.
summary: This course examines the mental processes involved in perception, attention, memory, language, thinking, and problem-solving through the lens of modern cognitive science.
